cast.name: 艾米莉娅·福克斯 Emilia Fox
威廉·加米那拉 William Gaminara
克里斯蒂娜·科尔 Christina Cole
爱丽丝·塞克斯 Alice Sykes
山姆·哈兹尔丁 Sam Hazeldine

writer.name: 蒂莫西·普拉格 Timothy Prager

director.name: 萨杜斯·奥沙利文 Thaddeus O'Sullivan

trans_title: 无声的证言 第十六季
introduction: Confectionery magnate John Briggs, head of an ailing empire and at odds with union leader Kenny Barber, is found dead of an apparent heart attack in a hotel bedroom. He was about to sell his company to millionaire Emmett Schwartzman. His sole heir is long estranged daughter Geraldine, to the chagrin of his brother Phillip, whom Geraldine appoints as company director. Young police pathologist Jack Hodgson claims Briggs was murdered, believing he had been with a prostitute, and is sufficiently persuasive that Leo recruits him to replace Harry, now working in New York. Briggs' right hand man Trenter pays off escort Deanna Collier, who is actually Geraldine's daughter and had just tracked Briggs down. Geraldine gives Deanna a charm bracelet but soon afterwards the girl is murdered.
chinese_title: 无声的证言 第十六季
